summary.message: CRITICAL: TypeScript health compromised. Immediate action required.

alerts.action: Add explicit types to improve coverage

details: src/pages/Portfolio.tsx(1764,37): error TS2352: Conversion of type '{ property: AnalysisProperty; analysis: PropertyAnalysisResult; valuation: ValuationData; date: string; preparedBy: string; ... 8 more ...; supernovaEnhancements: { ...; }; }' to type 'ReportData' may be a mistake because neither type sufficiently overlaps with the other. If this was intentional, convert the expression to 'unknown' first.

src/services/pdfExportService.ts(154,11): error TS2322: Type 'unknown' is not assignable to type 'string | number'.

recommendations: Increase type coverage by adding explicit interfaces
